title: Build Start To Succeed coaching institute marketing website (Home, About, Courses, Contact) with SEO + click-to-call/WhatsApp

requirements.text: Create a modern, light-themed, fully responsive (mobile-first) marketing website for the coaching institute “Start To Succeed” using a white background with blue/red accent colors, clean typography, spacious layout, modern cards/icons, soft shadows, and smooth hover animations across interactive elements.

quotes: Build a professional, modern, light-themed website for an educational coaching institute named “Start To Succeed.”

acceptanceCriteria: All pages/sections render correctly from 320px mobile up through desktop widths without horizontal scrolling.
Primary and secondary CTAs have visible hover/focus states and consistent spacing.
Typography (headings, body, buttons) is consistent site-wide and readable with sufficient contrast in the light theme.

requirements.text: Implement the Home page with: (1) Hero section containing a headline, subheadline, and three CTA buttons: “Call Now”, “WhatsApp Us”, and “Enroll Now”; (2) “Why Choose Start To Succeed” section using icon cards; (3) “Courses Offered” highlights for Classes 6–12, IIT-JEE Foundation, and NEET Foundation; (4) a strong CTA banner near the bottom of the page.

quotes: Call-to-Action buttons: Call Now, WhatsApp Us, Enroll Now
Courses Offered (Class 6–12, IIT-JEE Foundation, NEET Foundation)

acceptanceCriteria: The hero CTAs are visible above the fold on mobile and desktop and are accessible via keyboard navigation.
The “Why Choose” icon-card layout adapts from a single-column stack on mobile to multi-column on larger screens.
The CTA banner includes a clear message and at least one actionable button that routes/scrolls to the Contact/Enroll action.

requirements.text: Implement an About Us page/section containing content blocks for Mission, Vision, and Teaching Methodology with a student-centric, results-oriented emphasis and a trust-focused, academic, premium tone appropriate for students and parents.
acceptanceCriteria: About content is organized into clearly labeled subsections (Mission, Vision, Teaching Methodology) with scannable headings.
Layout remains readable and visually consistent with the Home page styling on all breakpoints.

requirements.text: Implement a Courses page/section that lists (A) Board classes (6–12) and (B) Competitive foundation (IIT-JEE & NEET), where each course/card includes a short description and a CTA that drives enrollment/contact intent (e.g., scroll to contact form or open WhatsApp).

quotes: Each course with short description and CTA

acceptanceCriteria: Courses are grouped into the two requested categories and are visually distinct (headings + card grid/list).
Each course item has a working CTA that triggers a clear next step (scroll to contact, open WhatsApp, or open enroll modal/section).

requirements.text: Implement a Contact Us page/section that displays the institute’s address and phone/WhatsApp details, provides a contact form (name, phone, optional email, message), and includes a Google Map embed for the address. Use the exact business information provided.

quotes: Address: Apt, 171, opp. Adya Green, P.O. Garia Gardens, Garia, Rajpur Sonarpur, West Bengal 700084

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the exact address text and phone/WhatsApp number as provided.
The map embed renders on desktop and mobile; it is loaded in a performance-friendly way (e.g., lazy loading).
Submitting the contact form shows a success/failure state and does not cause a full page reload.

requirements.text: Add backend support for the contact form by implementing canister methods to create/store contact inquiries (including timestamp) and allow the frontend to submit inquiries. Persist inquiries in stable storage so they survive canister upgrades.
acceptanceCriteria: A frontend form submission results in a stored inquiry record in the canister.
Inquiry records persist across canister upgrades using stable storage patterns.
Backend validates required fields (at minimum: name, phone, message) and returns clear error responses for invalid input.

requirements.text: Implement a site-wide footer containing quick links (to Home, About, Courses, Contact), contact details (address + phone), and social links using the exact provided URLs for Facebook and Google My Business.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer links navigate to the correct page/section targets.
Facebook and Google My Business links open in a new tab and use safe link attributes (e.g., rel="noreferrer").
Footer remains readable and well-spaced on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Implement functional contact integrations: (1) click-to-call phone links using the provided phone number; (2) a sticky “WhatsApp” button visible on mobile that opens a WhatsApp chat to the provided number; (3) ensure the “Call Now” and “WhatsApp Us” hero buttons use these integrations.

quotes: Call-to-Action buttons: Call Now, WhatsApp Us

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking any phone link triggers a tel: link with the provided number.
The sticky WhatsApp button appears on mobile viewports and does not overlap critical UI elements (e.g., form submit button).
WhatsApp actions open the correct WhatsApp deep link/chat to the provided number.

requirements.text: Add SEO and accessibility enhancements: use semantic headings (single H1 per page/primary view), descriptive meta title/description per page, Open Graph basics, accessible form labels, keyboard navigability, visible focus states, and image alt text. Ensure fast loading by minimizing heavy assets and lazy-loading non-critical content (e.g., map embed).
acceptanceCriteria: Each page/primary route sets a unique document title and meta description aligned with “Start To Succeed” and the page’s content.
All interactive elements are reachable by keyboard and have visible focus styling.
Form fields have associated labels and errors are announced/visible.
Non-critical embeds (map) are lazy-loaded or deferred to reduce initial load cost.

requirements.text: Generate and include branded static images as frontend assets: a primary institute logo and a light-themed hero background/illustration aligned with an academic, trust-focused, premium look. Store them under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the header/hero and as favicon/app icon where appropriate.

quotes: Build a professional, modern, light-themed website for an educational coaching institute named “Start To Succeed.”

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served via the backend).
Logo is used in the site header and as a favicon/app icon where supported.
Hero graphic renders crisply on desktop and mobile and does not harm text readability (sufficient contrast).

constraints: Use only Internet Identity if authentication is ever needed (no third-party auth).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.

Do not modify any immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Online payments, subscriptions, or any checkout flow.
Student login portals, dashboards, attendance, or test/quiz systems.
Sending emails/SMS/WhatsApp messages via external providers (store inquiries in-canister only).

required: Minimal, premium academic logo mark with book/laurel motif in blue and red on transparent background (sts-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Light-themed hero background illustration with subtle academic elements and ample whitespace (sts-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
Simple favicon/app icon derived from the logo, high-contrast on light backgrounds (sts-favicon.dim_128x128.png)
